blog1.details: Learn the basics of how the fretboard works with smoke on the water
blog1.article: When playing the guitar it's important to keep in mind that yoru accuracy will depend on your skill and understanding of the fretboard. Understanding how ot work anchor points is very improtant to helping you maintain stability on the guitar

blog2.details: Learn how to use a pick more accurately through some short excersises
blog2.article: When using a pick, it's important to rememeber that the sound generates from your effective strumming. Learning how to strum quickly and controlled will produce a much more accurate and pleasing sound when strummed.
